tag_list: marketing, creative, ux, ui, brand, branding, business, journees, remix, dj, liquid, human, slate, accuracy
overview:
Eric is an eco-warrior, creative and serial entrepreneur. He has worked in music, fashion, design, electronics and real estate.

For the past 20 years Eric founded several companies including Journees Music, Remix brand clothing, Remix record store (think dance music and djs), Accuracy Marketing and Human Slate lifestyle computing.

Journees Music is a leading US-based, independent electronic dance music label with well over 100 releases. Eric leads the label’s music and visual direction. There are several sublabels under the Journees umbrella to better organize dance music sub-genres.

Remix is a pop culture fashion brand. Eric is in charge of the collection’s creative direction and functions as the main designer. Remix has been an in-demand brand, especially among the dance music community and dj culture.

Riding off the popularity of the Remix apparel and music background Eric founded the Remix Store, which, for four years, was a dance music destination in San Mateo, CA.

Accuracy Marketing is an alter ego for one of Eric’s driving passions, design. Eric and his team do branding, lifestyle marketing consulting, contract design, web development, and CMS and e-commerce solutions.

Human Slate is the newest venture with long-time associate, Shilo Maggi. The pair import and distribute lifestyle computers and accessories.
